overview:
Ray Conley is the founder and CEO of CreekStone Capital Management. CreekStone’s investment strategies include two hedge funds and a secondary stock venture fund.

Prior to creating CreekStone Capital in 2010, Mr. Conley was a partner at Palo Alto Investors from 2003 to 2010, and founding partner of Oak Hill Venture Partners from 1997 to 2003. He was also a business analyst at McKinsey & Company, an engineer at Hughes Aircraft Company, and Director of New Business Development at SensAble Technologies.

Mr. Conley currently serves on the board of directors of LeanTaas Software, PinkZulu, and Advisor Team. He is a strategic advisor to Reciprocity Inc.
